title: Under And Over It
lyrics: Yeah, go! Did you hear the one about me being a punk? Did you hear the one about me being a drunk? Did you hear the one about me losing my nerve? Or how I'm just another fucking sheep in the herd? Did you hear about the money, how it made me change? So funny to me, all the time that they waste Did you hear the one about me giving a shit? 'Cause if I ever did, I don't remember it You can be me and I will be you You can live just like a star I'll take my sanity, you take the fame I'm under it, over it all I'm under and over it Did you hear the one about me playing the game?
